name: Random Hilichurl Summon
description:
There are 4 kinds of Hilichurl Summons in total:
Cryo Hilichurl Shooter: Deal 1 Cryo DMG at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
Hydro Samachurl: Deal 1 Hydro DMG at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
Hilichurl Berserker: Deal 1 Pyro DMG at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
Electro Hilichurl Shooter: Deal 1 Electro DMG at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
descriptionraw:
There are 4 kinds of Hilichurl Summons in total:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Hilichurl Shooter</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Samachurl</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hilichurl Berserker</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Hilichurl Shooter</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
